StoredProcedureOraclev10g.name: UPDATEADMIN
StoredProcedureOraclev10g.source: CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE GRUPO10.UPDATEADMIN(pIDPerson IN NUMBER, pFirstName IN VARCHAR2, pSurname IN VARCHAR2,&lt;br/&gt;pTitle IN VARCHAR2, pAddress IN VARCHAR2, pPhone IN NUMBER, pPostcode IN NUMBER, pCampusLocation IN VARCHAR2, pIdBuilding IN VARCHAR2,&lt;br/&gt;pNumberOffice IN VARCHAR2, pStaffType IN VARCHAR2, pAdmiTitle IN VARCHAR2, pComputerSkill IN VARCHAR2,&lt;br/&gt;pOfficeSkill IN VARCHAR2) AS&lt;br/&gt;BEGIN &lt;br/&gt; UPDATE Admin_table admin&lt;br/&gt; SET admin.surname = pSurname,&lt;br/&gt; admin.firstName = pFirstName,&lt;br/&gt; admin.title = pTitle,&lt;br/&gt; admin.address = pAddress,&lt;br/&gt; admin.phone = pPhone,&lt;br/&gt; admin.postcode = pPostcode,&lt;br/&gt; admin.campusLocation = pCampusLocation,&lt;br/&gt; admin.idBuilding = pIdBuilding,&lt;br/&gt; admin.numberOffice = pNumberOffice,&lt;br/&gt; admin.staffType = pStaffType,&lt;br/&gt;&lt;br/&gt; admin.admiTitle = pAdmiTitle,&lt;br/&gt; admin.computerSkill = pComputerSkill,&lt;br/&gt; admin.officeSkill = pOfficeSkill&lt;br/&gt; WHERE admin.idPerson = pIDPerson;&lt;br/&gt;END updateAdmin;
